Diagnostic Summary - Baseline Changes

Source: R/data.R
BLCHANGE.Rd

Diagnostic Summary - Baseline Changes data. More information is available at https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Usage

data(BLCHANGE)

Format

A data frame with 15436 observations and 30 variables.

Source

https://adni.loni.usc.edu/data-samples/adni-data/

Details

  • ORIGPROT character Original study protocol , with options: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • COLPROT factor Study protocol of data collection , with levels: ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2, ADNI3, ADNI4

  • PTID character Participant ID

  • RID numeric Participant roster ID Range value: 2, ..., 10894

  • VISCODE character Visit code

  • VISCODE2 character Translated visit code

  • EXAMDATE Date Form Completed Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • BCPREDX character Pre-visit Diagnosis 1=NL ; 2=MCI ; 3=AD Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCADAS character 1. Clinically relevant worsening on ADAS?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCMMSE character 2. Clinically relevant worsening on MMSE?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCMMSREC character 3. Clinically relevant worsening on MMSE recall?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCNMMMS character 4. Clinically relevant worsening on non-memory MMSE items?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCNEUPSY character 5. Clinically relevant worsening in memory on neuropsych testing?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCNONMEM character 6. Clinically relevant impairment/worsening in non-memory cognitive domains on neuropsych testing?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCFAQ character 7. Clinically relevant worsening in activities of daily living (FAQ)?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCCDR character 8. Clinically relevant deterioration on CDR Sum of Boxes or Overall CDR rating?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCDEPRES character 9. Clinically relevant depression based on clinical judgement or GDS?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCSTROKE character 10. Did subject have a stroke?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCDELIR character 11. Is there evidence of a delirium (medication effect, toxic or metabolic encephalopathy)?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCEXTCIR character 12. Has extenuating circumstance (such as a physical health problem, change in residence, charge in support network, death of a family member, etc.) contributed to a change in the subject's cognitive or functional performance?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCCORADL character 13. Is the change in clinical status corroborated by informant report of changes in ADL?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No ; -1=NA/No change in clinical status

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: -1=NA/No change in clinical status ; 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • BCCORCOG character 14. Is the change in clinical status corroborated by informant report of changes in cognition?

    • ADNI1, ADNIGO, ADNI2: 1=Yes ; 0=No ; -1=NA/No change in clinical status

    • ADNI3, ADNI4: -1=NA/No change in clinical status ; 0=No ; 1=Yes

    Decoded Value: Yes

  • ID numeric Record ID Range value: 2, ..., 187119

  • SITEID numeric Site ID Range value: 1, ..., 941

  • USERDATE User Create Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • USERDATE2 User Last Modify Date Date: YYY-MM-DD

  • DD_CRF_VERSION_LABEL character CRF Version Label , with options: annual, sc, bl

  • LANGUAGE_CODE character Language Code e=English Decoded Value: Yes

  • HAS_QC_ERROR character Has Quality Check Error 0=Does not have QC error or QC error has been approved ; 1=Has QC error Decoded Value: Yes

  • update_stamp POSIXct: YYY-MM-DD

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
